text: Le Chevalier Leonardo De (or de) Prunner (died 1831) was an Italian soldier, a mineralogist and an entomologist. He wrote Catalogus larvarum Europae (1793, 39 pages) and Lepidoptera Oedemontana illustrata (1798, 127 pages). ==Sources== *Cesare Conci et Roberto Poggi (1996), Iconography of Italian Entomologists, with essential biographical data. Memorie della Società entomologica Italiana, 75 : 159-382. *Courte bibliographie en italien de Musei universitari ==External links== *Letter of 15 March 1810 to Thomas Jefferson Founders Archives. U.S. National Archives Category:Italian entomologists Category:Italian lepidopterists Category:18th-century births Category:1831 deaths
title: Leonardo De Prunner
